/*!

 * Licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).
 * Source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/63763497
 */
export function getInitials(seed) {
    return seed
        .match(/(^\S\S?|\s\S)?/g)
        .map((v) => v.trim())
        .join('')
        .match(/(^\S|\S$)?/g)
        .join('')
        .toLocaleUpperCase();
}
